name: Boho Maxi Dress
desc: A flowy, floor-length dress with earthy tones and intricate paisley patterns. Made from light cotton, perfect for festival vibes or a beach day.

name: Urban Tech Runner
desc: Sleek, black sneakers with neon green accents and a chunky, responsive sole. Designed for city exploration and making a bold statement.

name: Minimalist Gold Hoops
desc: Classic, thin 18k gold hoop earrings. A timeless and elegant accessory that works for both professional meetings and casual outings.

name: Cozy Knit Cardigan
desc: An oversized, chunky-knit cardigan in a warm cream color. Feels like a warm hug, perfect for reading by the fire or a chilly autumn walk.

name: Distressed Denim Jacket
desc: A vintage-wash denim jacket with strategic rips and a relaxed fit. The essential piece for a rebellious, edgy, and layered look.

name: Silk A-Line Skirt
desc: A high-waisted, champagne-colored silk skirt that drapes beautifully. Sophisticated and chic, ideal for a dinner date or a formal event.

name: Power-Move Blazer
desc: A structured, sharp-shouldered blazer in royal blue. This piece commands attention and is perfect for a powerful, confident, urban look.

name: Retro Graphic Tee
desc: A soft cotton T-shirt featuring a bold, retro 80s-inspired graphic print. Ideal for casual days and vintage street style.

name: Linen Summer Set
desc: A breathable linen crop top and shorts combo in soft sage green. Lightweight, airy, and perfect for resort wear or summer travel.

name: Monochrome Jogger Set
desc: A sleek black-and-white jogger set with minimalist lines. Combines comfort and streetwear aesthetics for everyday confidence.

name: Romantic Lace Blouse
desc: Delicate white lace blouse with puff sleeves and pearl buttons. Evokes a soft, romantic feel ideal for date nights or garden parties.

name: Mountain Explorer Jacket
desc: A rugged, water-resistant windbreaker in forest green. Built for outdoor adventures but stylish enough for the city.

name: Artisan Leather Tote
desc: Handcrafted full-grain leather tote bag with brass accents. Timeless design that ages beautifully and complements a sophisticated look.

name: Neon Street Hoodie
desc: Vibrant neon hoodie with oversized fit and bold logo print. Perfect for those who love expressive, high-energy streetwear.

name: Serenity Yoga Set
desc: A seamless, stretch-fit yoga bra and leggings set in muted lavender. Designed for movement, mindfulness, and effortless beauty.

name: Velvet Wrap Dress
desc: Rich burgundy wrap dress made from soft velvet, flattering all figures. Perfect for evening events or romantic dinners.

name: Cropped Leather Jacket
desc: A cropped black leather jacket with silver zippers. Adds instant edge to any outfit while maintaining a modern fit.

name: Denim Midi Skirt
desc: A medium-wash denim midi skirt with front slit and raw hem. Perfectly blends retro charm with modern casual.

name: Athletic Windbreaker
desc: Lightweight color-blocked windbreaker with adjustable hood. Functional, sporty, and stylish for outdoor workouts or travel.

name: Tulle Midi Skirt
desc: Soft blush tulle skirt with layered volume and satin waistband. A dreamy piece for parties, dates, or creative photoshoots.

name: Wool Beret
desc: Classic wool beret in deep charcoal. Brings effortless Parisian charm to any look.

name: Graphic Oversized Sweater
desc: Oversized knit sweater with bold geometric patterns and bright colors. Adds fun and warmth to your fall wardrobe.

name: Faux Fur Coat
desc: Luxurious faux fur coat in creamy white. Glamorous yet cruelty-free, perfect for winter evenings.

name: High-Waist Cargo Pants
desc: Beige cargo pants with multiple pockets and tapered cuffs. Street-ready, functional, and ultra-modern.

name: Chunky Platform Boots
desc: Black faux-leather platform boots with bold soles. A statement shoe for street or grunge fashion lovers.

name: Cable Knit Scarf
desc: Extra-long wool scarf in soft oatmeal color. Wraps you in warmth and hygge comfort.

name: Tailored Wide-Leg Trousers
desc: High-rise trousers in charcoal gray with perfect drape. A staple for office chic and minimalist wardrobes.

name: Beaded Festival Top
desc: Colorful hand-beaded crop top with fringe details. Made for dancing under the sun and celebrating creativity.

name: Puffer Vest
desc: Lightweight metallic puffer vest with zip closure. Great for layering and adding shine to sporty looks.

name: Ribbed Knit Dress
desc: Body-hugging ribbed dress in mocha brown. Simple yet flattering, ideal for everyday wear or layering.

name: Satin Slip Dress
desc: Champagne-colored slip dress with thin straps and smooth drape. A timeless piece for date nights or formal events.

name: Graphic Beanie

name: Vegan Leather Pants

name: Oversized Denim Shirt

name: Knitted Midi Dress
